title: PSA: Please dont take the large Raptor
body:
After a certain point in the game, everyone is going to start taking jungle farm. Thats fine I get that, but ***please*** leave the large Raptor. The smite buff is more valuable than the gold it gives. Take the small ones, but leave the large Raptor for the Jungler.

Sincerely,
Your Jungler

replies.body: sincerely, the jungler that actually wants vision control because holy hell is that hard to get in season 6
"We here at Rito games feel that people were not warding enough. Our response: to remove the availability of 75g stealth wards from the shop"
Warding is easier now than its even been. Not sure if you are aware, but trinkets didnt always exist to give you free wards the entire game
Agreed.  A lot of people are just really lazy and won't ward to begin with.  Warding?  Oh, that's the support's job.

I disagree. Trying to keep all 6 entrences to mid lane warded (and the zones behind your tower if the enemy is someone like {{champion:154}} or {{champion:421}} is impossible without help due to the long cds.
You don't need to keep all 6 entrances warded. If it was possible to do so, it would essentially, to some extent, ruin the Fog of War.
Wards easier, thus why having raptors is more important, cause its also more easier for their team as-well

Wrong.

It was the easiest LAST season (and the season when trinkets were introduced, dont remember when that was).

This is a good thing though! Too much information makes the game boring.

Personally, though, I'd love to see Riot explore the possibilities. The trinkets and jungle buffs like skuttle, wolves, and raptor were a good start, but they're only scratching the surface.
yep. a little to much on the vision restriction. Seriously, until 20 min the whole map is ususally pitch black.

I only care if I don't smite it first, and I get angry with friends who play jungle but don't let me smite it. I'm like "You know what it does and why I need it, why would you take it?" then they say the needed the gold while our mid/top towers have massive creep waves in front of them. THEN THEY GET THOSE TOO!

i have a special place in my heart for my rappies
http://whatscookingamerica.net/Vegetables/Russet_Potato.jpg
its really annoying when people take the mini raptors though, if you are playing a champion with any kind of aoe it makes your clear a lot less efficient.
Nah man i need that gold to buy me a pretty hat{{item:3089}} {{item:3090}}

If the jungler is stacking health (such as a fighter or a tank), that includes the Gromp.
